testcase.name: ParseMap_CastleOnMountain_shouldThrowError()

failure.message: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: An exception was expected because the the castle was placed on a mountain! ==> Unexpected exception type thrown, expected: <java.lang.RuntimeException> but was: <exceptions.BadHalfMapGeneratedException>
